entry.title: Thursday: Rain at times heavy. High 11.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy changing to showers this afternoon. Amount 40 to 50 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 90 this morning then becoming southwest 50 gusting to 90 this afternoon. High 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
